## Import data lego.csv and Find the three most common first name in customers
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
read_csv("lego_sales.csv")
lego_sales %>%
  mutate(firstname = fct_infreq(first_name)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = first_name)) + geom_bar()
  
```

## Find the three most common themes
```{r}
lego_sales%>%
  mutate(theme = fct_infreq(theme)) %>%
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = theme)) + geom_bar()
```
